Ethnologue > Web version > Country index > Americas > Peru > Cashibo-Cacataibo

Cashibo-Cacataibo

A language of Peru

ISO 639-3: cbr

Population  5,000 (1999). Some women over 50 monolingual.
Region  Aguaytía, San Alejandro, Súngaro rivers.
Language map  Peru, reference number 20
Alternate names   Cachibo, Cacibo, Cahivo, Caxibo, Hagueti, Managua
Dialects  Cacataibo de Mariscal, Cacataibo de Sinchi Roca, Cashibo.
Classification  Panoan, Western
Language use  Official language. Vigorous. All domains. All ages.
Language development  Literacy rate in L1: 5%–10%. Literacy rate in L2: 15%–25%. Taught in primary schools. Poetry. Dictionary. NT: 1978.
Writing system  Latin script.
Comments  SOV. Traditional religion, Christian.
